question.text: Remove all items from your desk in preparation for the office reorganization, but do not attempt to move heavy furniture by ___.

answer.explanation: Do st by yourself = Do st on your own = Do st without help

question.text: Effective publicity helps a company keep a high profile by reminding the public of ___ most successful or innovative products.

answer.explanation: The answer comes before a noun so we choose "its".

question.text: To ensure prompt return of your laundry, ___ your hotel room number on the tag provided.

answer.explanation: We don't use any verb tense when giving instructions.

question.text: All products on ___ in the store window are available at reduced prices.
Because Hong Kong is home to people from all over the world, a ___ of fashion styles can be seen in the city on any given day.

answer.explanation: A variety of st = Different types of st

question.text: The teachers' association has announced that the food and drinks ___ supplied at the annual conference will not be provided this year.

answer.explanation: "This year" means that the adverb relates to time or frequency so we choose "usually".

question.text: Payment of monthly parking vouchers can be made either by personal check ___ by automatic withdrawal from a bank account.
Dhyana Home Improvement routinely offers discounts to local nonprofit organizations that are ___ new buildings.
Visitors to the library are asked to speak ___ and keep conversations brief when in the main reading room.

answer.explanation: We are giving more information on the verb "to speak" so we use an adverb.

question.text: Unlike traditional book publishers, P-Gram Books focuses ___ on producing audio books that can be downloaded from the Internet.

answer.explanation:
We are giving more information on the verb "focuses" so we use an adverb.
Exclusively = Only
